General.Name: Westward Gold Inc
General.Description: Westward Gold Inc., a mineral exploration company, engages in the exploration, acquisition, evaluation, and development of mineral resource properties in the United States. The company's flagship property is the Toiyabe Gold Project located in the Lander County, Nevada, in which it has an option to acquire 100%. The company was formerly known as IM Exploration Inc. and changed its name to Westward Gold Inc. in October 2021. Westward Gold Inc. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1055 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4N7
